    Snapshot

    Hey! I'm Sahil.

    When I'm not studying or coding, I can be found hanging out with my friends, dancing, finding a new coffee shop, exploring restaurants around Philadephia, or listening to Drake. Hopefully this website gives you a snapshot of my interests and passions. Feel free to reach out - I'd love to start a conversation!
